article_title: Coal-Mining Accidents Kill Three in Three Days
article_text:
Three miners were killed in separate accidents during the past week in the first three-day sequence of U.S. coal-mining fatalities in more than a decade.

Joseph Main, head of the federal Mine Safety and Health Administration, called the deaths from Friday to Sunday "extremely troubling." There were three coal-mining fatalities also...

Three miners were killed in separate accidents during the past week in the first three-day sequence of U.S. coal-mining fatalities in more than a decade.
There were three coal-mining fatalities also...
Joseph Main, head of the federal Mine Safety and Health Administration, called the deaths from Friday to Sunday "extremely troubling."
